name: Space Blaster 2.0
description:
This is my final 2D shooter

Modifications

1) New soundtrack for every scene/level. Made on Garage Band!

2) New Sprite for player! created by 3djeebs.daportfolio.com/

3) New Background for main menu found here: https://lithub.com/a-poet-and-a-novelist-discuss-the-literary-allure-of-outer-sp...

scripts and designs by: Brian Winn

Game development by: Abby Falardeau
